PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The absorption maxima and edges of the polymer solutions showed little dependence upon perylene contents.

Let's think step by step.

1. absorption maxima
2. edges
3. perylene contents

These are the property names mentioned in the paragraph. Absorption maxima refers to the wavelength of maximum absorption in a material's absorption spectrum. Edges refer to the wavelengths at the beginning and end of a spectral feature, such as an absorption band. Perylene contents refer to the concentration or amount of perylene present in the polymer solutions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. absorption maxima
2. edges
3. perylene contents (as it refers to the property of the polymer solutions)

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph. Absorption maxima and edges are properties related to the absorption spectrum of the material, while perylene contents refers to the concentration or amount of a specific material (perylene) present in the solution.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption maxima |
| edges |
| perylene contents |

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table format with a single column labeled "Property Name".

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The absorption maxima and edges of the polymer solutions showed little dependence upon perylene contents.

Let's think step by step.

1. Absorption maxima: This refers to the wavelength of light at which a substance absorbs the most. It is a measurable property of a substance and can be considered a value.
2. Perylene contents: This is the amount or concentration of perylene present in the polymer solutions. It is also a measurable property and can be considered a value.

So, the property value entities in the paragraph are "absorption maxima" and "perylene contents".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

The absorption maxima showed little dependence on perylene contents.

Property values:
1. Absorption maxima
2. Perylene contents (concentration or amount of perylene)
